Basic form:

256 bit:
81.111s / 641 tests = 0.126538221528861s per modexp

512 bit:
162.567s / 161 tests = 1.009732919254658s per modexp

1024 bit:
325.671s / 41 tests = 7.94319512195122s per modexp

2048 bit:
708.568 / 11 tests = 64.415272727272727s per modexp



MARY optimized:
256 bit:
70.309/641 = 0.109686427457098s per modexp

512 bit:
137.358 /161 = 0.853155279503106s per modexp

1024 bit:
272.815/41 = 6.654024390243902 per modexp

2048 bit:
593.595/11 =53.963181818181818 per modexp

ShiftAdd Optimized:
256 bit:
17.807/641 = 0.027780031201248s per modexp

512 bit:
34.806s/161 = 0.216186335403727

1024 bit:
63.132s/41 = 1.53980487804878

2048bit:
130.821s/11= 11.892818181818182s per
